introduction.section1: Located south of Peninsular Malaysia, it is an island city-state in Southeast Asia.
introduction.section2: Singapore is a forgotten country. The transit between two flights, rarely visited. Yet if you take the trouble to stop there, you will discover gorgeous places like Marina Bay, the Merlion, or even Garden by the Bay. Singapore is also full of parks and reserves with extraordinary flora and fauna that will make you forget the city. Walk in botanical garden or in the jungle to observe monitor lizards or hornbills.
introduction.section3: Discover this small country through our articles and our photos.

google-description: Discover Singapore through our articles and our photos, from a modern city to the jungles. Follow our guide to discover our selection of known and little-known must-see places. For each place visited we try to transcribe our visit as best as possible by telling you: Where to go? How to get there? Why? When? How long and at what period?

Yet if you take the trouble to stop there, you will discover gorgeous places with extraordinary flora and fauna that will make you forget the city. Walk in botanical garden or in the jungle to observe monitor lizards or hornbills. Follow our guide to discover our selection of must-see places.
